Congratulations! Your name is selected for a special LIC investment scheme. Share bank details to activate high returns offer. || Investment Scams

Sir, main SBI se bol raha hoon. Aapke account mein unusual activity dikha raha hai, OTP bataye taki hum rok sake. || Identity Theft

Namaste, aapka internet connection upgrade hone wala hai. Team aapko remote help degi, abhi laptop open karke TeamViewer code share kariye. || Tech Support Scam

You have a pending electricity bill. Pay now via link sent to your mobile to avoid disconnection. || Service Fraud

Hello, your number has won a Tata car in our lucky draw! Pay registration fee of Rs. 4,500 to claim the prize. || Lottery Scam

Madam, aapka Jio SIM deactivate hone wala hai. KYC details abhi bataye warna number bandh ho jayega. || Impersonation

Sir, we are offering instant personal loan with zero processing fees. Please share your documents on WhatsApp. || Loan Scam

This is from Amazon. Your courier is on hold due to address issue. Please confirm your address and card details now. || Fake Delivery Scam

Dear customer, renew your DTH subscription now and get free extra channels. For easy renewal, share your card details. || Subscription Scam

Apke son ke accident ki call aayi thi. Paisa bhej do, hospital mein hain, abhi zarurat hai. || Emotional Manipulation

Congratulations! You are shortlisted for a work from home job. Pay Rs. 800 registration fee and start earning today. || Job Offer Scam

Dear customer, suspicious login attempt detected on your account. Kindly verify with your 6-digit OTP. || Financial Fraud

Congratulations! You've been selected for an exclusive mutual fund scheme with 40% returns in 3 months. Pay ₹5000 to start investing now. Offer closes today. || Investment Scams

Dear customer, your electricity connection will be disconnected within 2 hours due to unpaid bills. Quickly click this link to clear dues and avoid interruption: powersecure.in || Service Fraud

Hi, I am calling from Income Tax Department. There is a case against your PAN. To resolve, please confirm your Aadhaar number and date of birth. || Impersonation

You have received a parcel from Amazon. Delivery pending due to address issue. Call 8100XXXXXX to confirm and reschedule your order. || Fake Delivery Scam

Your Paytm wallet KYC has expired. Please follow the process online by clicking this link to update and avoid suspension: verify-paytm.co.in || Identity Theft

Hello madam, our team is offering instant personal loans at 0% interest for a limited period. Simply share your salary slip and bank statement on WhatsApp to proceed. || Loan Scam

Dear Sir/Madam, due for annual subscription renewal of Zee Premium Pack. Your account will be debited ₹399 unless you cancel today. Call us to opt out. || Subscription Scam

Urgent: Your device is infected with a dangerous virus. Please call our helpline 1800-515-XXXX so we can assist you in removing it. || Tech Support Scam

Sir, you have been shortlisted for remote data-entry job with ₹30,000/month. Kindly deposit ₹1500 as registration fee to start training immediately. || Job Offer Scam

Congratulations! You are selected as winner of the Mega India Lucky Draw. To claim ₹2 lakh, pay processing fee of ₹3500. Call 987XX987XX now for details. || Lottery Scam

Sonu, I haven’t eaten since morning. Please, can you send me ₹2000 urgently? I’m in trouble and can’t reach anyone else. Promise I’ll return it. || Emotional Manipulation

Your SBI debit card is blocked due to suspicious login. Please reply with your card details and PIN to reactivate instantly. || Financial Fraud

Hello, you have been selected for a limited-time pre-approved personal loan. Share your bank details to get funds instantly credited to your account.  
|| Loan Scam

Congratulations! Your number has won ₹2 lakh in our Diwali Lucky Draw. Please call 9876543210 to claim your cash prize.  
|| Lottery Scam

This is Microsoft support. We have detected a virus on your computer. To protect your data, please install the software from the link sent to your email.  
|| Tech Support Scam

Sir, we've noticed suspicious activity on your savings account. Please call SBI Helpline at 1800-11-6569 to secure your funds.  
|| Phishing

Good morning, your vehicle insurance is about to expire. Pay renewal charges now at this link to avoid a late fine.  
|| Service Fraud

You are eligible for exclusive investment returns with our gold mutual funds. Minimum deposit just ₹5000. Interested? Call us back now.  
|| Investment Scams

Your Amazon parcel is on hold due to address confirmation. Click on this link and update your info to receive your delivery.  
|| Fake Delivery Scam

This is HR from Tata Motors. Your profile is shortlisted. Pay ₹999 for document processing to proceed with job joining.  
|| Job Offer Scam

Hi, your mobile recharge subscription will expire today. Reply with card details to continue the service without interruption.  
|| Subscription Scam

Sir, your KYC document is invalid for your bank account. Provide your OTP and update Aadhar details to avoid account freeze.  
|| Impersonation

Mummy, I lost my phone and wallet. I’m at the police station. Please send ₹10,000 urgently to this UPI ID and don’t call, just reply here.  
|| Emotional Manipulation

Quick alert! A new UPI device registered under your name. If this was not you, please share your OTP to stop unauthorized access.  
|| Financial Fraud

Congratulations! Your mobile number has been selected for a free laptop giveaway. To claim, kindly share your Aadhaar details for verification. Hurry, offer valid today only! || Lottery Scam

This is a reminder: your KYC is pending with Paytm. Please share your PAN card and OTP sent to your phone to avoid account suspension. || Identity Theft

Sir, you’ve received a cashback of ₹5000 from Flipkart. To receive it, kindly pay a processing fee via UPI to our official account. Call us after transfer. || Financial Fraud

Hello, this is Rahul from Provident Loans. You’re pre-approved for an instant loan up to ₹2 lakhs. Send your bank copy and Aadhaar for quick disbursal. || Loan Scam

Respected customer, your electricity bill payment failed. Immediate action required to avoid supply disconnection. Share your bank details or UPI to clear dues now. || Service Fraud

Dear user, important security update for your computer. Please let us access your system remotely to resolve the issue and protect your files from viruses. || Tech Support Scam

Sir, my son is admitted in hospital, but I’ve lost my wallet. Can you urgently transfer ₹3000 to this number? God will bless you. || Emotional Manipulation

We are searching for candidates for work-from-home data entry roles with up to ₹25,000 salary. Register with ₹499 now to confirm your spot. || Job Offer Scam

Invest ₹10,000 in our new crypto plan and get double returns within a week. Book your spot by calling now. Limited seats, no risk! || Investment Scams

Your Netflix subscription will expire in 24 hours. To avoid interruption, click the link and update your payment details immediately. || Subscription Scam

Hello, delivery boy here, I have your parcel but need a small clearance fee. Please send ₹150 to this Paytm number for release. || Fake Delivery Scam

Dear customer, I am the manager from ICICI Bank. For premium benefits, please share your ATM PIN for activation. || Impersonation
